description:
http://anidb.net/ch35552 [Marika]`s mother. She was a legendary female pirate, known as "Blaster Ririka," but after she separated from her husband Gonzaemon, she started working at Shin Okuhama Airport as an air-traffic controller and brought up Marika on her own. Naturally, she hid the fact that she was a pirate from Marika, but because Gonzaemon`s death caused Bentenmaru`s crew to contact them directly, she had to disclose the truth.
Source: Official Site
name: Katou Ririka
